name: Cheers
summary_text: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

name: Saw
summary_text: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

name: American Dad!
summary_text: The random escapades of Stan Smith, a conservative C.I.A. Agent dealing with family life, and keeping America safe, all in the most absurd way possible.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
summary_text: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.

name: The Lighthouse
summary_text: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

name: Never Have I Ever
summary_text: The complicated life of a modern-day first generation Indian American teenage girl, inspired by Mindy Kaling's own childhood.

name: The Blues Brothers
summary_text: Jake Blues, just released from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and his brother Elwood were raised.

name: The Predator
summary_text: When a young boy accidentally triggers the universe's most lethal hunters' return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled scientist can prevent the end of the human race.

name: A Star Is Born
summary_text: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

name: Supernova
summary_text: Sam and Tusker are traveling across England in their old RV to visit friends, family and places from their past. Since Tusker was diagnosed with dementia two years ago, their time together is the most important thing they have.

name: The Pact
summary_text: An unexplained death - and five friends bound together by a fragile pact of silence. What really happened that night in the woods?

name: The Lion King
summary_text: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

name: Good Kids
summary_text: Four high school students look to redefine themselves after graduation.

name: Ex Machina
summary_text: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a highly advanced humanoid A.I.

name: Batman Begins
summary_text: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

name: Independence Day
summary_text: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

name: Servant
summary_text: A Philadelphia couple is in mourning after an unspeakable tragedy creates a rift in their marriage and opens the door for a mysterious force to enter their home.

name: Blade Runner
summary_text: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

name: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
summary_text: Marinette and Adrien, two normal teens, transform into superheroes Ladybug and Cat Noir when an evil threatens their city.

name: The Twilight Zone
summary_text: Ordinary people find themselves in extraordinarily astounding situations, which they each try to solve in a remarkable manner.

name: Elementary
summary_text: A modern take on the cases of Sherlock Holmes, with the detective now living in New York City.

name: Mad About You
summary_text: Mad About You centers on the trials and tribulations of a married couple living in New York.

name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
summary_text: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

name: Keeping Up with the Kardashians
summary_text: A peek inside the exploits and privileged private lives of the blended Kardashian-Jenner family, including sisters Kim, Kourtney, Khloé, Kendall and Kylie.

name: Charmed
summary_text: Three sisters discover their destiny, to battle against the forces of evil, using their witchcraft. They are the Charmed Ones.

name: Ghostbusters
summary_text: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

name: American Crime Story
summary_text: An anthology series centered around America's most notorious crimes and criminals.

name: Us
summary_text: A family's serene beach vacation turns to chaos when their doppelgängers appear and begin to terrorize them.

name: Dead to Me
summary_text: A series about a powerful friendship that blossoms between a tightly wound widow and a free spirit with a shocking secret.

name: Deadpool 2
summary_text: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

name: Ray Donovan
summary_text: Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family.

name: MacGyver
summary_text: Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives.

name: Married... with Children
summary_text: Al Bundy is a misanthropic women's shoe salesman with a miserable life. He hates his job, his wife is lazy, his son is dysfunctional (especially with women), and his daughter is dim-witted and promiscuous.

name: Memento
summary_text: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

name: Tell Me Your Secrets
summary_text: Emma is a woman who looked into the eyes of a dangerous killer, John was a serial predator desperate to find redemption, and Mary is trying to find her missing daughter. As each of them is pushed to the edge, their pasts grow murkier.

name: Snatch
summary_text: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

name: Hawkeye
summary_text: Series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Hawkeye, centering on the adventures of Young Avenger, Kate Bishop, who took on the role after the original Avenger, Clint Barton.

name: Ratatouille
summary_text: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

name: Cars
summary_text: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

name: Good Will Hunting
summary_text: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

name: The Dig
summary_text: An archaeologist embarks on the historically important excavation of Sutton Hoo in 1938.

name: Travelers
summary_text: Hundreds of years from now, surviving humans discover how to send consciousness back through time, into people of the 21st century, while attempting to change the path of humanity.

name: Midnight in the Switchgrass
summary_text: An FBI agent and Florida State officer team up to investigate a string of unsolved murder cases.

name: Take Shelter
summary_text: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.

name: Gemini Man
summary_text: An over-the-hill hitman faces off against a younger clone of himself.

name: Revenge
summary_text: An emotionally troubled young woman sets out to exact revenge against the people who wronged her father.

name: Unbelievable
summary_text: A teenager is charged with lying about having been raped, but two detectives follow the path to the truth.

name: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
summary_text: In 1957, archaeologist and adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. is called back into action and becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

name: The Mirror Has Two Faces
summary_text: A shy, middle-aged professor enters into a romantic but non-physical relationship with an unlucky-in-love colleague.

name: Vera
summary_text: With her caustic wit and singular charm, DCI Vera Stanhope and her team face a series of captivating murder mysteries set against the breathtaking Northumberland landscape.

name: Four Weddings and a Funeral
summary_text: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

name: News of the World
summary_text: A Civil War veteran agrees to deliver a girl, taken by the Kiowa people years ago, to her aunt and uncle, against her will. They travel hundreds of miles and face grave dangers as they search for a place that either can call home.

name: That '70s Show
summary_text: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.

name: Grimm
summary_text: A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
summary_text: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

name: Green Book
summary_text: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

name: Aliens
summary_text: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

name: The World to Come
summary_text: Somewhere along the mid-19th century American East Coast frontier, two neighboring couples battle hardship and isolation, witnessed by a splendid yet testing landscape, challenging them both physically and psychologically.

name: The Sixth Sense
summary_text: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

name: Reign
summary_text: Mary, Queen of Scots, faces political and sexual intrigue in the treacherous world of the French court.

name: Stoker
summary_text: After India's father dies, her Uncle Charlie, whom she never knew existed, comes to live with her and her unstable mother. She comes to suspect this mysterious, charming man has ulterior motives and becomes increasingly infatuated with him.

name: Die in a Gunfight
summary_text: In New York City, a young guy falls for the daughter of his father's nemesis.

name: Above Suspicion
summary_text: The story that leads to the first conviction for murder of an FBI agent.

name: The Godfather: Part II
summary_text: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

name: Green Lantern
summary_text: Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

name: Endeavour
summary_text: Set in the 1960s, the show follows Endeavour Morse in his early years as a police constable. Working alongside his senior partner DI Fred Thursday, Morse engages in a number of investigations around Oxford.

name: Split
summary_text: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

name: Star Wars Rebels
summary_text: A brave and clever ragtag starship crew stands up against the evil Empire as it tightens its grip on the galaxy and hunts down the last of the Jedi Knights.

name: The Sparks Brothers
summary_text: THE SPARKS BROTHERS, is a musical odyssey through five weird and wonderful decades with Ron and Russell Mael celebrating the inspiring legacy of Sparks.

name: Altered Carbon
summary_text: Set in a future where consciousness is digitized and stored, a prisoner returns to life in a new body and must solve a mind-bending murder to win his freedom.

name: Dracula
summary_text: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

name: The Flash
summary_text: The plot is unknown. Feature film based on the comic book superhero, The Flash.

name: Buster
summary_text: Based on the story of Ronald Christopher "Buster" Edwards (Phil Collins), one of the thieves involved in "The Great Train Robbery" of 1963.

name: Stargirl
summary_text: Teenager Courtney Whitmore joins the Justice Society of America. Based on the character from DC Comics.

name: Dirilis: Ertugrul
summary_text: The heroic story of Ertugrul Ghazi, the father of Osman (Uthman) who founded the Ottoman Empire.

name: Dunkirk
summary_text: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

name: The Mummy
summary_text: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreak havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.

name: Jack Reacher
summary_text: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

name: House of Gucci
summary_text: The story of how Patrizia Reggiani, the ex-wife of Maurizio Gucci, plotted to kill her husband, the grandson of renowned fashion designer Guccio Gucci.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
summary_text: As Harry, Ron, and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

name: The Martian
summary_text: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

name: Alita: Battle Angel
summary_text: A deactivated cyborg's revived, but can't remember anything of her past and goes on a quest to find out who she is.

name: Oldboy
summary_text: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

name: Mission: Impossible 7
summary_text: Seventh entry in the long-running Mission: Impossible series.

name: Hero Mode
summary_text: A teenage coding genius has just 30 days to create the world's greatest video game or his family loses everything. No pressure.

name: The Sandlot
summary_text: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

name: Firefly
summary_text: Five hundred years in the future, a renegade crew aboard a small spacecraft tries to survive as they travel the unknown parts of the galaxy and evade warring factions as well as authority agents out to get them.

name: Special
summary_text: A young gay man with cerebral palsy branches out from his insular existence in hopes of finally going after the life he wants.

name: Predator
summary_text: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

name: Sicario
summary_text: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
summary_text: They've travelled through space. They've travelled through time. Now, they'll have to travel through dimensions as their galaxy seems to rip itself apart. Ratchet and Clank must save the universe - again.

name: Iron Man 2
summary_text: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

name: Zoey's Extraordinary Playlist
summary_text: A young woman discovers she has the ability to hear the innermost thoughts of people around her as songs and musical numbers.

name: Oz
summary_text: A series chronicling the daily activities of an unusual prison facility and its criminal inhabitants.

name: Luther
summary_text: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

name: Crimson Peak
summary_text: In the aftermath of a family tragedy, an aspiring author is torn between love for her childhood friend and the temptation of a mysterious outsider. Trying to escape the ghosts of her past, she is swept away to a house that breathes, bleeds - and remembers.

name: Don't Look Up
summary_text: The story of two low-level astronomers, who must go on a giant media tour to warn mankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet earth.

name: The Little Mermaid
summary_text: A live-action remake of the animated Disney classic.

name: The Magnificent Seven
summary_text: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

name: Black Sails
summary_text: Follows Captain Flint and his pirates twenty years prior to Robert Louis Stevenson's classic novel "Treasure Island."

name: Too Hot to Handle
summary_text: On the shores of paradise, gorgeous singles meet and mingle. But there's a twist. To win a $100,000 grand prize, they'll have to give up sex.

name: The Night Of
summary_text: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

name: The Usual Suspects
summary_text: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

name: Snowfall
summary_text: A look at the early days of the crack cocaine epidemic in Los Angeles during the beginning of the 1980s.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
summary_text: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

name: Thor: The Dark World
summary_text: When the Dark Elves attempt to plunge the universe into darkness, Thor must embark on a perilous and personal journey that will reunite him with doctor Jane Foster.

name: Lovecraft Country
summary_text: A young African-American travels across the U.S. in the 1950s in search of his missing father.

name: Mamma Mia!
summary_text: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular 1970s group ABBA.

name: The Cabin in the Woods
summary_text: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin, where they get more than they bargained for, discovering the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

name: Uncut Gems
summary_text: With his debts mounting and angry collectors closing in, a fast-talking New York City jeweler risks everything in hope of staying afloat and alive.

name: The Thing
summary_text: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

name: Spaceballs
summary_text: A star-pilot for hire and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.

name: Maharani
summary_text: A political drama set in Bihar of 1990's.

name: Magnum P.I.
summary_text: An ex-Navy SEAL returns from Afghanistan and uses his military skills to become a private investigator in Hawaii.

name: Spirited Away
summary_text: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

name: The VelociPastor
summary_text: After losing his parents, a priest travels to China, where he inherits a mysterious ability that allows him to turn into a dinosaur. At first horrified by this new power, a hooker convinces him to use it to fight crime. And ninjas.

name: Ma
summary_text: A lonely woman befriends a group of teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

name: The Hateful Eight
summary_text: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

name: Man on Fire
summary_text: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

name: Rome
summary_text: A down-to-earth account of the lives of both illustrious and ordinary Romans set in the last days of the Roman Republic.

name: Captain America: Civil War
summary_text: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

name: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
summary_text: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

name: Hacksaw Ridge
summary_text: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

name: Starship Troopers
summary_text: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

name: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
summary_text: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

name: Wonder
summary_text: Based on the New York Times bestseller, this movie tells the incredibly inspiring and heartwarming story of August Pullman, a boy with facial differences who enters the fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

name: Skins
summary_text: The story of a group of British teens who are trying to grow up and find love and happiness despite questionable parenting and teachers who more want to be friends (and lovers) rather than authority figures.

name: New Tricks
summary_text: Three retired police officers are drafted in to solve cold cases, with a touch of comedy and drama

name: Degrassi: The Next Generation
summary_text: The lives of the kids at Degrassi Community School dealing with the serious and sometimes taboo issues that plague teenagers.

name: Bates Motel
summary_text: A contemporary prequel to Psycho, giving a portrayal of how Norman Bates' psyche unravels through his teenage years, and how deeply intricate his relationship with his mother, Norma, truly is.

name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
summary_text: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

name: The Space Between
summary_text: Micky Adams, an eccentric has-been rock musician, loses his grip on reality all while his record label is looking to drop him. A young Charlie Porter is tasked with traveling to the musician's bizarre home and forcing Micky Adams out of his contract.

name: Chinatown
summary_text: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

name: The Outsiders
summary_text: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

name: Point Break
summary_text: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

name: The Notebook
summary_text: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
summary_text: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

name: Casino
summary_text: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

name: Judas and the Black Messiah
summary_text: Offered a plea deal by the FBI, William O'Neal infiltrates the Illinois chapter of the Black Panther Party to gather intelligence on Chairman Fred Hampton.

name: Big Mouth
summary_text: Teenage friends find their lives upended by the wonders and horrors of puberty.

name: Fast & Furious
summary_text: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

name: The Aviator
summary_text: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
summary_text: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

name: The Karate Kid
summary_text: A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.

name: Grown Ups
summary_text: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

name: Summer of 85
summary_text: While boating, Alexis's boat capsizes and almost drowns before being rescued by David, who ultimately ends up as the friend of his dreams.

name: Network
summary_text: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

name: Downton Abbey
summary_text: The continuing story of the Crawley family, wealthy owners of a large estate in the English countryside in the early twentieth century.

name: Trainspotting
summary_text: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

name: Justice League
summary_text: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

name: The Big Short
summary_text: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market. In their research they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

name: Kick-Ass
summary_text: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
summary_text: The story of the Joestar family, who are possessed with intense psychic strength, and the adventures each member encounters throughout their lives.

name: Bewitched
summary_text: A witch married to an ordinary man cannot resist using her magic powers to solve the problems her family faces.

name: Midway
summary_text: The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it.

name: Burn Notice
summary_text: A spy recently disavowed by the U.S. government uses his special ops training to help others in trouble.

name: Edge of Tomorrow
summary_text: A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

name: City Slickers
summary_text: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

name: Carnival Row
summary_text: A human detective and a fairy rekindle a dangerous affair in a Victorian fantasy world, where the city's uneasy peace collapses when a string of murders reveals an unimaginable monster.

name: Emily in Paris
summary_text: A young American woman from the Midwest is hired by a marketing firm in Paris to provide them with an American perspective on things.

name: Twister
summary_text: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

name: Anne with an E
summary_text: The adventures of a young orphan girl living in the late 19th century. Follow Anne as she learns to navigate her new life on Prince Edward Island, in this new take on L.M. Montgomery's classic novels.

name: The Many Saints of Newark
summary_text: A look at the formative years of New Jersey gangster, Tony Soprano.

name: The Old Guard
summary_text: A covert team of immortal mercenaries is suddenly exposed and must now fight to keep their identity a secret just as an unexpected new member is discovered.

name: Honest Thief
summary_text: Wanting to lead an honest life, a notorious bank robber turns himself in, only to be double-crossed by two ruthless FBI agents.

name: The Ice Road
summary_text: After a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada, a ‘big-rig’ ice road driver must lead an impossible rescue mission over a frozen ocean to save the trapped miners.

name: Enola Holmes
summary_text: When Enola Holmes-Sherlock's teen sister-discovers her mother missing, she sets off to find her, becoming a super-sleuth in her own right as she outwits her famous brother and unravels a dangerous conspiracy around a mysterious young Lord.

name: Wonder Woman
summary_text: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

name: Tokyo Revengers
summary_text: A middle-aged loser travels in time to his school years and in order to save the love of his life from future doom, he must become the leader of a dreaded school gang.

name: The Four Seasons
summary_text: Three couples vacation together every season. After one divorces, feelings of betrayal and more spawn criticisms of each other. But the things that keep them together are stronger than those which otherwise might pull them apart.

name: Dirty Dancing
summary_text: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

name: What Women Want
summary_text: A cocky, chauvinistic advertising executive magically acquires the ability to hear what women are thinking.

name: Bloodline
summary_text: A family finds themselves forced to face their past secrets and scars when the black sheep returns home.

name: The Love Boat
summary_text: The romantic and comic tales of the passengers and crew of the cruise ship, Pacific Princess.

name: Captain Fantastic
summary_text: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

name: Trying
summary_text: All Jason and Nikki want is a baby, but it's the one thing they just can't have. So, they decide to adopt. With their dysfunctional friends, screwball family, and chaotic lives will the adoption panel think they're ready to be parents?

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
summary_text: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

name: Logan
summary_text: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

name: Coming 2 America
summary_text: The African monarch Akeem learns he has a long-lost son in the United States and must return to America to meet this unexpected heir and build a relationship with his son.

name: Donnie Darko
summary_text: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

name: True Romance
summary_text: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

name: The Terminator
summary_text: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

name: Bumblebee
summary_text: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small California beach town. On the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, Charlie Watson discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken.

name: Puberty Blues
summary_text: In the late 1970s, Debbie and Sue are inseparable teenage girls.

name: Dawn of the Dead
summary_text: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

name: Vincenzo
summary_text: During a visit to his motherland, a Korean-Italian mafia lawyer gives an unrivaled conglomerate a taste of its own medicine with a side of justice.

name: Tropic Thunder
summary_text: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

name: Narcos: Mexico
summary_text: The rise of the Guadalajara Cartel as an American DEA agent learns the danger of targeting narcos in Mexico.

name: Frozen
summary_text: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

name: Power
summary_text: James "Ghost" St. Patrick, a wealthy New York night club owner who has it all, catering to the city's elite and dreaming big, lives a double life as a drug kingpin.

name: Doctor Strange
summary_text: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

name: Zootopia
summary_text: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

name: Sense8
summary_text: A group of people around the world are suddenly linked mentally, and must find a way to survive being hunted by those who see them as a threat to the world's order.

name: Big Fish
summary_text: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

name: Adventure Time
summary_text: A 12-year-old boy and his best friend, wise 28-year-old dog with magical powers, go on a series of surreal adventures with each other in a remote future.

name: Fast Five
summary_text: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

name: The Shape of Water
summary_text: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

name: Merlin
summary_text: These are the brand new adventures of Merlin, the legendary sorcerer as a young man, when he was just a servant to young Prince Arthur on the royal court of Camelot, who has soon become his best friend, and turned Arthur into a great king and a legend.

name: Everybody Loves Raymond
summary_text: The comical everyday life of sports columnist Ray Barone and his dysfunctional family.

name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
summary_text: Two Jedi escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their original glory.

name: Mr. Mercedes
summary_text: Tells the story of a psychopathic killer who drives a stolen Mercedes into a crowd and a recently retired detective who tries to bring him down.

name: Leverage
summary_text: A crew of high-tech crooks attempt to steal from wealthy criminals and corrupt businessmen.

name: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
summary_text: Son of Naruto Uzumaki, Boruto, follows his father's footsteps along with his friends to become great ninja. Throughout all their adventures, Boruto is determined to make his mark in the ninja world and live outside of his father's shadow.

name: About Time
summary_text: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

name: The Town
summary_text: A proficient group of thieves rob a bank and hold Claire, the assistant manager, hostage. Things begin to get complicated when one of the crew members falls in love with Claire.

name: The Invisible Man
summary_text: When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax. As a series of coincidences turn lethal, Cecilia works to prove that she is being hunted by someone nobody can see.

name: Uncharted
summary_text: The story is a prequel to the games, starring Holland as a younger Drake, showing us details of how he came to meet and befriend Sully.

name: Goliath
summary_text: A disgraced lawyer, now an ambulance chaser, gets a case that could bring him redemption or at least revenge on the firm which expelled him.

name: The Andy Griffith Show
summary_text: Widower Sheriff Andy Taylor, and his son Opie, live with Andy's Aunt Bee in Mayberry, North Carolina. With virtually no crimes to solve, most of Andy's time is spent philosophizing and calming down his cousin Deputy Barney Fife.

name: After We Fell
summary_text: Just as Tessa makes the biggest decision of her life, everything changes. Revelations about her family, and then Hardin's, throw everything they knew before in doubt and makes their hard-won future together more difficult to claim.

name: Fruits Basket
summary_text: After Tohru is taken in by the Soma family, she learns that twelve family members transform involuntarily into animals of the Chinese zodiac and helps them deal with the emotional pain caused by the transformations.

name: The Lion King
summary_text: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

name: Star Trek: Enterprise
summary_text: A century before Captain Kirk's five-year mission, Jonathan Archer captains the United Earth ship Enterprise during the early years of Starfleet, leading up to the Earth-Romulan War and the formation of the Federation.

name: Futurama
summary_text: Philip J. Fry, a pizza delivery boy, is accidentally frozen in 1999 and thawed out on New Year's Eve 2999.

name: Heroes
summary_text: Common people discover that they have super powers. Their lives intertwine as a devastating event must be prevented.

name: Furious 6
summary_text: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.

name: Monsters at Work
summary_text: A Monsters, Inc. series set 6 months after the Monsters, Inc. film about the monsters getting their energy from children's laughs instead of their screams.

name: The Magicians
summary_text: After being recruited to a secretive academy, a group of students discover that the magic they read about as children is very real-and more dangerous than they ever imagined.

name: Streets of Fire
summary_text: A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.

name: The King's Man
summary_text: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war to wipe out millions.

name: Gravity Falls
summary_text: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.

name: Cashback
summary_text: After a painful breakup, Ben develops insomnia. To kill time, he starts working the late night shift at the local supermarket, where his artistic imagination runs wild.

name: Room
summary_text: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

name: Romancing the Stone
summary_text: A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure hunting for treasure with a mercenary rogue.

name: Taboo
summary_text: Adventurer James Keziah Delaney returns to London during the War of 1812 to rebuild his late father's shipping empire. However, both the government and his biggest competitor want his inheritance at any cost - even murder.

name: The King of Staten Island
summary_text: Scott has been a case of arrested development since his firefighter dad died. He spends his days smoking weed and dreaming of being a tattoo artist until events force him to grapple with his grief and take his first steps forward in life.

name: Black Lightning
summary_text: A crusading school principal gets back into action as the original African-American electrical superhero.

name: Bull
summary_text: Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick.

name: The Hunt
summary_text: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

name: Friday Night Lights
summary_text: A drama that follows the lives of the Dillon Panthers, one of the nation's best high school football teams, and their head coach Eric Taylor.

name: Space Jam
summary_text: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

name: Candyman
summary_text: A "spiritual sequel" to the horror film Candyman (1992) that returns to the now-gentrified Chicago neighborhood where the legend began.

name: Casino Royale
summary_text: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

name: Masters of the Universe
summary_text: The heroic warrior He-Man battles against the evil lord Skeletor and his armies of darkness for control of Castle Grayskull.

name: The Clovehitch Killer
summary_text: A picture-perfect family is shattered when the work of a serial killer hits too close to home.

name: The Good Wife
summary_text: Alicia Florrick (Julianna Margulies) has been a good wife to her husband, a former state's attorney. After a very humiliating sex and corruption scandal, he is behind bars. She must now provide for her family and returns to work as a litigator in a law firm.

name: Black Clover
summary_text: Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus.

name: The Interpreter
summary_text: Political intrigue and deception unfold inside the United Nations, where a U.S. Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate an interpreter who overhears an assassination plot.

name: The Middle
summary_text: The daily mishaps of a married woman and her semi-dysfunctional family and their attempts to survive life in general in the town of Orson, Indiana.

name: Nanatsu no taizai
summary_text: The legend of the confrontation between the Seven Deadly Sins and the Holy Knights.

name: Moneyball
summary_text: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

name: Black Space
summary_text: An ordinary morning at a small-town High School turns into a nightmare when anonymous figures in masks have committed a massacre leaving four dead students.

name: Cast Away
summary_text: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

name: Little Fires Everywhere
summary_text: Based on Celeste Ng's 2017 bestseller, "Little Fires Everywhere" follows the intertwined fates of the picture-perfect Richardson family and the enigmatic mother and daughter who upend their lives.

name: John Wick: Chapter 2
summary_text: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

name: 30 Rock
summary_text: Liz Lemon, head writer of the sketch comedy show "TGS with Tracy Jordan", must deal with an arrogant new boss and a crazy new star, all while trying to run a successful television show without losing her mind.

name: Alien: Covenant
summary_text: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

name: Romeo + Juliet
summary_text: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

name: Love, Simon
summary_text: Simon Spier keeps a huge secret from his family, his friends and all of his classmates: he's gay. When that secret is threatened, Simon must face everyone and come to terms with his identity.
